data.caption: Clarification sought from Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Ltd on January 28 2026 with reference to news appeared in https://www.cnbctv18.com dated January 28 2026 quoting "HPCL Castrol India team up to develop re-refined base oil ecosystem in India"

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Ltd on January 28 2026 with reference to news appeared in https://energy.economictimes.indiatimes.com dated January 28 2026 quoting "HPCL seeks Venezuelan crude to boost heavy oil runs"

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting : Consideration & Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results For The First Quarter Ended June 30, 2021. (Financial Year 2021-2022)
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that at the Meeting of the Board of Directors held on Wednesday, August 04, 2021, the Board has, inter-alia, considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the First Quarter (Period: April 2021 - June 2021) ended June 30, 2021. The copy of said Unaudited Financial Results along with Limited Review Report of the Auditors are attached herewith.

The Meeting of the Board of the Directors commenced at 3.00 p.m. and concluded at 5.15 p.m.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body: In compliance of provisions of Regulation 23 (9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we write to forward herewith the Disclosures of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis, in the format specified, for the half-year ended March 31, 2021.    Kindly note that Board Meeting to consider the Audited Financial Results for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2021 was held on May 20, 2021.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting & Fixation Of Book Closure.
data.news_body:
Further to our letter Ref Co.Secy./VM/258/2021 dated May 10, 2021, we wish to inform that at the Board Meeting held today, the Board of Directors have considered and approved the following:
1. Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Financial Year 2020-2021
2. Recommendation of Final Equity Dividend for the Financial Year 2020-2021
3. Fixation of Book Closure Dates:
